page.title: 07Description of Haddenham
page.content: We like living in Haddenham because there are lots of things to do every weekend. It is a{big village}and people are friendly and always ready to help. There are{lots of little {lanes and houses}both old and modern. Some houses have been built on new estates. Many older houses have interesting histories.{There are lots {of places where you can walk. Haddenham is unique in having so many {high walls and cottages made of {wychert,}The high walls surrounding the gardens make the village feel cosy but there are{grassy open spaces and {duckponds too. There are lots of clubs and societies. Things go on every day so we don't get bored. There is a{good library and Health{Centre, busy shops and several {factories.}It's easy to get to places like{London}and{Oxford.
